PerfectNetExp.abs: keurboom 栏木 khosam (=kosam)苦参子, 鸦胆子 kilogram n.[物]千克, 公斤 kilohm n.[物]千欧姆 kilonem 营养单位 kimm [英方]厨用大木桶 kinetism (肌肉).

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Afrikaans, from keur 'choice' + boom 'tree'

means.word_mean: 1. fast-growing round-headed tree with fragrant white to deep rose flowers; planted as an ornamental
2. tree with odd-pinnate leaves and racemes of fragrant pink to purple flowers
